F

find(int, Suit) - Method in class hearts.Hand
Deprecated.
because it is super easy to find a card object in the list of cards.
findHighest(Suit) - Method in class hearts.Hand
Use this method to find the highest card in your shortest suit to develop a void as fast as possible early in the game.
findHighest() - Method in class hearts.Hand
 
findHighestBelow(Card) - Method in class hearts.Hand
Use the findHighestBelow method when you are neither the first nor last player in a particular trickâ€™s play sequence, and you are able to follow suit.
findLastHigh(Suit) - Method in class hearts.Hand
 
findLowest(Suit) - Method in class hearts.Hand
Use the findLowest(int suit) method to find the lowest club dealt, to start the game.
findLowest(Game) - Method in class hearts.Hand
Use the findLowest(Game game) method when leading, after you have developed your void.
findLowestAbove(Card) - Method in class hearts.Hand
 
findMiddleHigh(Game, Suit) - Method in class hearts.Hand
Use the findMiddleHigh method if the findHighestBelow method returned null.
firstHand(Game, Trick) - Method in class hearts.Hand
If the current size of the trick is zero (you are the first hand), play highest card in your shortest suit, but if this suit is a void let index equal the lowest card in any suit (the lowest of all)
